AI Description: FragGeneScan is a gene-finding program specifically designed for short reads from next-generation sequencing (NGS) technology. It predicts protein-coding sequences in short DNA sequences such as metagenomic and single-cell sequencing data.
Core Features: 1. Prediction Of Protein-Coding Sequences, 2. Designed For Short Reads From Ngs Technology, 3. Particularly Useful For Metagenomic & Single-Cell Sequencing Data, 4. Supports Both Metagenomic & Whole Genome Sequencing Data
General Tags: Gene Prediction, Ngs Data Analysis, Metagenomics, Single-Cell Sequencing
